mapper.select: select * from ( select a.id as c_id,c.user_id,b.account,a.`order` ,c.invite_userid,d.type_id, a.interest+a.service_fees+a.guarantee_fees as interest,a.repay_time,a.tender_id,b.borrow_id from rd_borrow_collection a left join rd_borrow_tender b on a.tender_id=b.id left join rd_user c on b.user_id=c.user_id left join rd_user d on d.user_id = c.invite_userid where c.type_id<>27 and c.type_id<>31 and d.type_id<>40 and b.borrow_id=#{borrowId} ) a where a.invite_userid >0
mapper.update: update rd_borrow_tender set invite_fees =( select round(ifnull(sum(t_fees),0)+ifnull(sum(g_fees),0)+ifnull(sum(s_fees),0),2) from rd_invite_fees where tender_id=#{id} ) where id=#{id}
